ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents updates to closed cases for all users except System Admins and Legal
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name != "System Administrator", $Profile.Name != "API Only", $Profile.Name != "Legal User", $Profile.Name != "Legal User Japan", $Profile.Name != "Super Admin", $Profile.Name != "Finance User", $Profile.Name != "Finance User Japan", $Profile.Name != "Sales Operations Japan", $Profile.Name != "Support Admin", $Profile.Name!="Case Survey Profile", $Profile.Name!="FormAcademySurvey Profile", $Profile.Name!="FormSalesOpsSurvey Profile", $Profile.Name!="FormJapanIncident Survey Profile", $Profile.Name!="Case View v1 Profile", $Profile.Name!='Japan Case View Profile', $User.Id <> "0053600000504C3", IsClosed = TRUE, PRIORVALUE(IsClosed) == IsClosed )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't update a closed case. Please create a Follow-Up Case.
